DOC.brief_title: The Effects Dexmedetomidine Peroperative Shivering Incidence Under Spinal Anesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: The design study include three study group do random order . The group follow : 1 ) Control group receive 15 mg levobupivacaine intrathecally intravenous 0.9 % sodium chloride ; 2 ) Intravenous group receive 15 mg levobupivacaine intrathecally intravenous dexmedetomidine ( 1mcg/kg/10min , 0.5mcg/kg/h infusion ) ; 3 ) Intrathecal group receive 15 mg levobupivacaine + 3 mcg dexmedetomidine intrathecally intravenous 0.9 % sodium chloride . Throughout study period , shiver score , tympanic temperature record , heart rate measure continuously use electrocardiogram ; blood pressure determine oscillometrically 5 min interval ankle . In case heart rate decrease 30 % baseline atropin receive blood pressure decrease 30 % baseline effedrin receive . Side effect ( bradycardia , hypotension , hypothermia , nausea vomit etc ) record peroperatively operate room postanesthetic care unit .
